Author: rms
Content: I like OK Cupid because of the word play in their name, just like the OK Computer album.

Author: brett
Content:
This was a pretty interesting watch, though I sorta had it going in the background while I did other stuff. The "we-wont-do-it-unless-we-are-having-totally-awesome-fun-100%-of-the-time" approach clearly needs to be taken with a grain (or pound) of salt, but I like to hope that it speaks to the power of being real excited about your products given they have definitely done a few things right with threadless.

The stress the motto "Your project is not good enough".

Author: Alex3917
Content: Also, in Firefox on OS X some of the comments are gray and others are black. Why is this?

Author: Elfan
Content: The genius of Facebook was getting  students at elite universities to divulge lots of potentially profitable information for advertising. They did this because Facebook was an exclusive place just for elite college kids (and later just college kids).  Now that its open to everyone it no longer has that value.   I don't see how it can reasonably continue to increase in value (although they could certainly find a greater fool to sell it to).

Author: pg
Content: They're all not launched and/or making something new.
